description:
Elon Musk isn't a politician by trade. But the business mogul and tech billionaire has become a growing force in the 2024 US elections, especially after endorsing Republican candidate Donald Trump. In a video podcast, reporters from Politico and Business Insider take a closer look at how he's shaping politics through his enterprises, from Starlink to X. 

MORE FROM BUSINESS INSIDER:
How Elon Musk Makes And Spends His Billions | Business Insider Explains | Business Insider
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=swqHIrY-ni8
How Can Polls Actually Be Getting Better? | Insider Docs | Business Insider
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Jpob_WQ3CQQ
How Billionaires Control US Elections | Business Insider Explains | Business Insider
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CTvrATfdl-Y

00:00 - Introduction
00:41 - Elon Musk The Businessman vs. Politician
02:01 - X & Social Media Influence
03:14 - Where Musk & Trump Diverge
03: 41 - Rise In MAGA Politics
05:13 - The Red Pill Meme
05:57 - The Evolution Of X 
07
title: How Elon Musk is Reshaping American Politics As 2024 Elections Heat Up | Business Insider
